Producer

Class ProductProducer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Producer.ProductProducer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProducerChild

    public abstract class ProductProducer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This is the Producer Base class that encapsulates the common methods.It maintains an internal queue and an array list to store the product list in order to generate a random products and generate a product message to be stored in the queue.
